FuncDef: This command defines the amount of HSQ IOM buffers that is set aside for internal system use. By default, 5% of the total buffer space is reserved for system internal queues. The command is provided for the case where the reserved buffer space is either insufficient or excessive. Exercise care when modifying this value.

ParaDef.Info: Specifies the percentage of HS buffers that are reserved for internal system use. This parameter is required when executing the system-reserve command. The parameter accepts a percent value with two decimal places (100th of a percent). Values-1.00 to 30.00.
